A translation of the poem can be found here:
SEE OVER: WE ARE EITHER PRINTING USING AN INTERNAL LINK TO OUR OWN TEXT REPOSITORY:

brief.value: Historical and political context can be important in interpreting a poem: even a self-consciously literary form like love elegy can respond to current affairs. Propertius 2.7 confronts the Emperor Augustusâ€™ proposed legislation against adultery.
